bibl.title: Callimachus and the Arcadian Asses: The Aitia Prologue and a Lemma in the London Scholion.
bibl.note: Discusses the image of the donkey in the Aitia Prologue (29-36) and in the London scholion, P. lit. Lond. 181 (= Pack2 197) = Pf. I, p. 7, 53-58.
AMBÜHL Annemarie, Callimachus and the Arcadian Asses: The Aitia Prologue and a Lemma in the London Scholion.
